item.title: Passenger Recounts ‘Tense’ Moments After Engine Sparks Force Plane to Land
item.description: The American Airlines flight with 153 passengers, which was headed to Charlotte, N.C., returned to Las Vegas shortly after takeoff. No one was injured...

item.title: Rubio Fleshes Out Trump’s Case That Iran Nuclear Capacity Was Eliminated
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio said U.S. strikes had destroyed a facility that is key to producing a nuclear weapon. He railed against a less optimist...

item.title: Mamdani’s Win Is More Striking When You Look at How He Won
item.description: Mamdani won in parts of the city people wouldn’t normally expect. Democrats should pay attention to his positive message and laser focus on costs.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Handpicked Vaccine Advisers Are Set to Meet for the First Time
item.description: The panel will revisit the hepatitis B shot given at birth, among others. The former head of an anti-vaccine group has been hired as a special employe...

item.title: Why Did the Novel-Reading Man Disappear?
item.description: Men are leaving fiction reading behind. Some people want to change that.
